summary: Build a dynamic, professional Financial Health Check-Up web page with a 10-question yes/no questionnaire, score-based results, and a contact page with WhatsApp CTA, branded with Axis Max Life logo and a background image.
architectural_notes: Use a simple yes-count score (0–10) derived from 10 yes/no inputs to determine the result category and display it dynamically.
known_issues: Background image asset and Axis Max Life logo file were referenced but not provided in the conversation.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional finance-themed background image with subtle pattern/gradient suitable for overlayed UI (financial-health-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Axis Max Life logo on transparent background, clean vector-like look (axis-max-life-logo.dim_600x200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a dynamic, professional Financial Health Check-Up page that presents exactly 10 provided questions with Yes/No answers only (no free-text), allowing the user to answer all questions and submit.

Implement scoring and results display based on the total number of “Yes” answers, and show the result immediately after submission. Use these result bands (inclusive): 0–5 = "Critical Zone"; 6–7 = "Need to review your financial plan"; 8–9 = "Good"; 10 = "Secure". Also display the numeric score (e.g., “Your score: 7/10”).

Add a dedicated Contact page (or clearly separated Contact section reachable via navigation) offering a review of the user’s financial health by the app owner, including a “Contact Now” button that opens WhatsApp chat to +91 88299 21156 (use a wa.me link).

Apply branding: set a provided background image behind the main page layout and display an Axis Max Life logo in the UI (e.g., header/top-left). Use locally served static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.

Create and apply a consistent, coherent visual theme for a professional finance/insurance experience (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) across the questionnaire and contact views. Do not use a blue+purple primary palette.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Financial Health Check-Up page with 10 provided questions in yes/no format
Implement scoring and results display based on number of 'Yes' answers (1–5 critical, 5–7 review plan, 8–9 good, 10 secure)
Add contact page/section with 'Contact Now' button linking to WhatsApp number +91 88299 21156 for financial health review
Apply branding: set provided image as page background and include Axis Max Life logo
